li.a: Mr. Marshall's Archived Letters to Parents Concerning Covid-19

li.data-alt: PISD will remain closed for remainder of school year

div.p:
Letter from Mr. Marshall, Tuesday, April 28th, 2020.
English
Spanish

If your child is struggling with stress or anxiety during this time, PISD has counselors who are available to help. Please click the COUNSELING SERVICES link above, fill out the form, and someone will contact you.

span.style: caret-color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #ffffff;

p.span: If you have questions or need help please contact your student's campus:

span.strong:
Please use the LINK above called "At Home Learning" to access online learning lessons.
or Click Here

strong.strong: Travel Reporting Form (Please fill out if you travel out of state)

p.span:
Beginning with the 2017 School Year, the Texas Education Agency (TEA) changed the way it reports special education enrollment in school systems.
See More Here, also in Español

div.div: PISD will remain CLOSED for the remainder of the school year. For questions, please call your student's campus.
